Option.BarSizePercentage.Name: Bobber Bar Size
Option.BarSizePercentage.Tooltip: What percentage of the playspace do you want the Bobber Bar to take up?
Option.Enabled.Name: Enabled?
Option.Enabled.Tooltip: Whether or not to resize the fishing bobber bar.
Option.ExceptBossFish.Name: Disable for Boss Fish?
Option.ExceptBossFish.Tooltip: Whether or not to have the resized fishing bobber bar for boss fish.
Option.OnlyCorkBobber.Name: Only work with Cork Bobber?
Option.OnlyCorkBobber.Tooltip: Whether or not the Bobber Bar resizing only works when a Cork Bobber is equipped on the current fishing rod.
